hintText: cyWhen making the claim, {{claimantName}} had to say the date they gave you notice (the date of service). If you're not sure of the exact date, you can find it on the notice
listItem1: cyThey served you with the notice seeking possession on {{noticeDate}}
noticeDateLabel: cyWhen did you recieve notice from {{claimantName}}? (Optional)

date.notRealDate: cyDate of notice must be a real date
date.futureDate: cyDate of notice must be in the past
date.invalidValue: cyDate of notice must be a real date
date.missingOne: cyYour date of notice must include a {{missingField}}
date.missingTwo: cyYour date of notice must include a {{first}} and {{second}}
